UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Beneficial Impacts of Incorporating the Non-Natural Amino Acid Azulenyl-Alanine into the Trp-Rich Antimicrobial Peptide buCATHL4B.
Literature.Author: D’Souza AR, Necelis MR, Kulesha A, Caputo GA, Makhlynets OV

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Sheep erythrocytes:15% Hemolysis=7.5 µM,Sheep erythrocytes:34% Hemolysis=15 µM,Mouse fibroblasts NIH 3T3:95% Killing=50 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli D31(MIC=7.5µM),Escherichia coli D31(MBC=7.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 35556(MIC=3.75µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 35556(MBC=3.75µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=15µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MBC=>15µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=3.75µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MBC=3.75µM)
